sentences.english: Often, government workers are paid according to a salary scale.
sentences.chinese: 政府员工拿薪水每每是根据一个薪水表。

sentences.english: The friend often sojourns , our home has boast quite of grade.
sentences.chinese: 朋友每每来作客，都夸我们家挺有品位的。

sentences.english: Many ancient poems and legends have linked attractiveness with a thin waist.
sentences.chinese: 很多古典诗歌和传说每每将魅力与纤腰联系起来。

sentences.english: Often think of my mission, Yan sad sympathetic, Vientiane, including Benjamin.
sentences.chinese: 每每想到自己的使命，就悲欣交感，万象悯含。

sentences.english: He often talked deep into the night surrounded by us entranced in his story.
sentences.chinese: 每每讲到深夜，同学们围在他的身边，听得极其入神。

sentences.english: That's why experienced mediocrity almost always trumps talent every time.
sentences.chinese: 这就是为何老练的平庸几乎每每胜过才华。

sentences.english: Usually on the street corners you can see street peddlers selling warm baked sweet potatoes.
sentences.chinese: 在陌头的拐角处，每每会有陌头小贩在卖烤红薯。

sentences.english: Often happy have bigger inanity to the pole , the general association sorrowful.
sentences.chinese: 每每快乐到极点，总会有更大的空虚悲伤。

sentences.english: With me, her point of attack was almost always aimed at my solo status.
sentences.chinese: 对我，她的攻击点几乎每每是在我的单身情况上面。

sentences.english: He's funny in the film as much, but often can be broken box office records calendar.
sentences.chinese: 他的电影以搞笑之多，但每每都能历破票房记录。

sentences.english: People are digging wells by hand, but they hit rock.
sentences.chinese: 人们用手掘井取水，却每每挖到顽石。

sentences.english: And she always wore a yellow dress to match the ribbon around her neck.
sentences.chinese: 简也每每身着黄衣，以搭配颈部的黄丝带。

sentences.english: Every time when Wanderer wrote, many bloggers came to join.
sentences.chinese: 每每闻知游客撰文忽悠，许多网友就来报名。

sentences.english: Often vowed to lose weight, but it always has been too hasty.
sentences.chinese: 每每信誓旦旦要减肥，却总是草草了事。

sentences.english: This inspired her to combine human physiology and technological advances.
sentences.chinese: 她的作品每每揉合人类生理和现代科技于一体。

sentences.english: Now this sort of sentimentality always makes me furious.
sentences.chinese: 直到今天，这号悲天悯人地情调每每令我发指。

definition: to recall/to think of/to call to mind
hard to avoid/difficult to escape from/will inevitably
to mention/to bring up (a subject)/with regard to/as for
